newsitem.title: UK: Tomkins shares up, SBC Warburg rates "buy".
newsitem.headline: Tomkins shares up, SBC Warburg rates "buy".

text.p: Shares in Tomkins Plc climbed on Wednesday after analysts at SBC Warburg upgraded their recommendation on the British baking-to-engineering conglomerate to "add" from "hold", dealers said.
By 1010 GMT Tomkins shares were 4-1/2p higher at 285.
Analysts at SBC Warburg were not immediately available for comment but market sources confirmed they had upgraded the stock.
